steps.text: Toast the bread slices until they are golden brown.
While the bread is toasting, mash the avocado in a bowl with a fork and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly onto the toasted bread slices.
Top the avocado toast with sliced tomatoes.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes if desired.
Enjoy your quick and delicious avocado toast!
